author: brcowing
title: Hotel Alane stay (Uk London Couple) - Paris City break
text: Purpose of our trip was to tour central Paris museums etc. Hotel is good value, very friendly staff, and 5-10 min walk from both Gare Du Nord and Gare de L'Est stations which gives you excellent choice of Metro lines and fast access to the rest of Paris on the door-step so no need to stay in expensive central hotels - metro to Notre Dame area took 10mins for example. Gare Du Nord is also the EUROSTAR terminal so no changing on arrival or departure for UK London based visitors such as ourselves. The hotel itself is room & continental breakfast. Staff were very friendly, minor check-in time. Our room although small was clean, quiet, comfortable with modern bathroom/shower, hair-dryer, TV, strong WiFi signal. There is a lift/elevator. Would definitely stay there again.
